reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan's fabric very soft and beautiful. The quality receives mixed feedback, with some customers describing it as high quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful. Size up!
items.body: I really love this sweater. The material used is so soft and feels like it is high quality. I was surprised to find something like this on Amazon. It drapes well in a flattering way. I will say, I ordered my normal size (medium, 5’8” 160 lbs) and it felt too tight while buttoned. And buttoning it is the whole point because it creates a beautiful silhouette! But it was too tight which then affected the draped look on the bottom of the cardigan. So I sized up to a large, and the large fit only slightly better. I am flat-chested so if you have a large bust, you might have to go up two sizes. The bigger size barely affected sleeve length. There isn’t any wiggle room with this cardigan, which I actually love, so make sure you get a slightly bigger size and you will not regret it. Read more
items.author: Alice

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it !
items.body: I love it ! The fit is perfect, the fabric is very soft and the length is as in the photo ! Very pretty ! Read more
items.author: Client d'Amazon

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and soft fabric
items.body: Material is amazing length is perfect the only thing that annoys me is the length of the sleeves, wish it was wide for a cuter fit. Read more
items.author: Brittany

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft
items.body: Amazing quality. Was very surprised. Very soft and stretchy ! Read more
items.author: Karina Lugo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, dramatic 90s throwback layering piece.
items.body: This is that amazing piece of clothing every 90s movie heroine had, but was somehow never available in stores. The fabric isn't really "sweater" knit...more like if modal were thicker, & softer. I actially prefer it because a layer like this is more for fun and not warmth. It will fit nicely under a coat or other layers if you live somewhere cold, and its still wearable if you live somewhere warm & you can only pretend there is a fall. I really wish they made tbis in a nice olive or army green! Read more
items.author: Urchin

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Weird shape that requires it be buttoned or its unwearable
items.body: When i opened the package I saw it and was like, did i seriously order this or did i get scammed? the quality is worse than most things on Shein and i will be returning it. Read more
items.author: I don’t like having a name

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Burgundy, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
